body:
The official team would like to congratulate PureDogs on winning Tournament #5: Conquest Inc. Prizes will be distributed soon.

All of the final scores can be found here: 
Qualifiers: http://avicus.challonge.com/conquestinc
Invitationals: http://avicus.challonge.com/ConquestInv

FIRST PLACE: PureDogs
SECOND PLACE: Team Allah
THIRD PLACE: Horizon

*ps*: PureDogs is the first team to beat Team Allah and take 1st place since The Omega Championship
As well as Please Congratulate {tag=b9117448b235465cba9e851664aedef0} for predicting the bracket 100%!

Congratulations and Regards,
The Avicus Official Team.

The Avicus Official Team.

replies.body: And how much money does the winner team get?
replies.body_tagged: And how much money does the winner team get?

replies.body:
According to my incorrect calculations, the team will gain $100 from all the donations, that is if Avicus reached their goal. If you divide it by 18 players (the number of people who played for PureDogs) then minus Zaoki because he cheated and that is 17 players so 

100 divided by 17
= $5.88 per person

I believe they had 15 on their tournament roster so scratch what I said before and that means $6.67 per person
eZ profit.

You can probably buy one of those big chocolate bars!
